title: Amakuru ya Tekinike - Urusengero rwa Orbital
heading: Amakuru ya tekiniki

satellite.heading: Satelite
satellite.specs:
Ibipimo: 50x58x64 mm
1P PocketQube
Uburemere: 245 gr
Ibikoresho: aluminium, zahabu, fiberglass, nibikoresho bya elegitoroniki.
Orbit: Uburebure 525 ± 25 km; impengamiro: SSO 97,6 ± 0.1 °
Uwatangije: PSLV (Ikinyabiziga cyoherejwe na Polar Satellite) ikoreshwa na ISRO

antenna.heading: Antenna / Igishusho
antenna.specs:
Ibipimo: m 6 (diameter) e 1,2m (uburebure)
Uburemere: kg 46
Ibikoresho: aluminium, epoxy indorerwamo yibibaho, dome ya aluminiyumu ya zahabu ihagaritswe binyuze muburyo bwa scafolding.

radio.heading: Iradiyo
radio.specs:
Hasi: 468.5 MHz
Guhindura: CSS
Umuyoboro mugari: TBD
